title: john138byears
author: john138byears
content: Hello All.I tried patent a free energy technology but spys around the world do not let me do it and it make sense to me. Then I tried contact UN and offered them patent this under UN's name so that it can establish peace justice cooperation worldwide. I discovered there is no UN.I encourage all hacktivists to unite and fix this awful world. I give you a scientific text message following with a few images which briefly describes the invention for an ordinary person. You must start emailing it to almost everybody and hack websites thus it appears all over the internet suddenly to make sure someone who reads the message can't register a patent to cause problem for others.Mirrors:Code:https://mega.nz/file/o7ZllY4D#TmAg1tYqg-6hEwbwDbv8W-8GDQ-aWU2SFhKjfBuhEjQhttps://www.sendspace.com/file/2c50ljhttps://gofile.io/d/j64lAThttps://www63.zippyshare.com/v/tRxU9dVQ/file.htmlhttps://anonfiles.com/hemf8dA3yf/scientific-message_7zhttps://turbobit.net/p17nvkmuxnnl.htmlhttps://1fichier.com/?bfbv2efibg7ddup39wcfhttps://download.gg/file-14217759_61505044a3c36b00https://megaup.net/2utazhttps://dailyuploads.net/trf176cbfhoohttps://send.cm/luoa89fi7th1https://uptobox.com/f8oasykm7jmmhttps://mixdrop.co/f/l6djel7eu3jdxmhttps://pixeldrain.com/u/mSbb1tU9https://siasky.net/PAM2hclXFA15sJyqGoylG2xuSzGyWkGU-KD_0Wb26xTrUghttps://www.file-upload.com/5usz73ret5dahttps://usersdrive.com/e17x5odc96b2https://www.upload.ee/files/14542912/scientific-message.7z.htmlhttps://bayfiles.com/i8m38fA7yd/scientific-message_7zhttps://clicknupload.to/m2gi3pc02iaqPassword:Code:xAehsDulqFtPublic key:Code:https://keys.openpgp.org/search?q=6205D99DDBD2AB41EBD1AEAB1026557B3415ADAF
